item.description:
On Saturday, August 18th the Strafford County GOP will be holding its annual picnic and straw poll. This is a large event that will feature appearances by several presidential candidates, INCLUDING DR PAUL. The picnic will run from 12:00 PM to 5:00 PM and will be held at the residence of Mr. and Mrs. Brian Payne, Center Strafford, Strafford, NH.

Please consider attending, as this is a good opportunity to meet the Congressman and to show your support by voting in the straw poll. We will also have a table at the event to distribute literature and other campaign materials.

The price is $20.00 per person, with children under 12 free. The price of the ticket includes a lunch of hot dogs and hamburgers. For more information, visit http://www.straffordc.... To purchase tickets, contact Suzanne at slhudson@metrocast.net
item.name: Strafford County GOP and STRAW POLL
